name: codemux
description: A unified AI coding assistant client - access multiple AI coding engines from any device via desktop app or web interface
author: realDuang

scripts.dist: bun scripts/predist.ts && electron-vite build && electron-builder --publish never
scripts.dist:mac: bun scripts/predist.ts && electron-vite build && electron-builder --mac --publish never
scripts.dist:mac:arm64: TARGET_ARCH=arm64 bun scripts/predist.ts && electron-vite build && electron-builder --mac --arm64 --publish never
scripts.dist:mac:x64: TARGET_ARCH=x64 bun scripts/predist.ts && electron-vite build && electron-builder --mac --x64 --publish never
scripts.dist:win: bun scripts/predist.ts && electron-vite build && electron-builder --win --publish never
